author: GameSpot
description:
Arc Raiders - here are 12 tips we wish we knew before playing. ARC Raiders is a multiplayer extraction adventure, set in a lethal future earth, ravaged by a mysterious mechanized threat known as ARC.

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Intro
00:14 - PvP rules of engagement
01:25 - Free Loadout
02:44 - Emptying your backpack
03:05 - Sliding
03:39 - Fighting bigger ARC
04:00 - How to track ARC indoors
04:23 - Running out of room
04:52 - Encumbrance 
05:21 - Extraction
05:58 - Exfil while downed
06:30 - Gear degredation
06:57 - Fall damage explained

#arcraiders #gamespot
title: Arc Raiders 12 Tips We Wish We Knew Before playing

author: GameSpot
description: Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 drops us deep into the underground labs of Playtime Co., and we get our first look inside in this brief teaser.
title: Poppy Playtime Chapter 5 - Official Teaser Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
Just in time for Halloween, take a listen to the track "Catharsis" by legendary composer, musician, producer, and sound designer Akira Yamaoka, well known for his work from the Silent Hill series.

Originally conceived as an award-winning total conversion mod, Total Chaos has been fully reimagined into a standalone nightmare using a modern engine, amplifying its chilling atmosphere and relentless tension for a new generation of players.

Fort Oasis is no paradise—it's a decaying nightmare where reality crumbles. The creator of Turbo Overkill unleashes survival-horror stacked with mysteries and monstrosities. Scavenge to craft weapons, while a voice on your walkie-talkie guides you into the island's depths.

#survivalhorror #akirayamaoka #horrorgaming
title: Total Chaos - "Catharsis" by Akira Yamaoka | Exclusive Music Preview Trailer
